items.name: Cold Cut Combo
items.description: Are you a meat-lover? Then you'll love this! One bite into these delicious deli meats and you'll be addicted.

items.name: Black Forest Ham
items.description: With unbeatable value and so many toppings to choose from, our hearty ham sandwich can become something new and exciting every day. Plus it contains just 4 grams of fat.

items.name: Veggie Delite
items.description: A banquet to celebrate your healthy lifestyle, stuffed full of delicious cool, crisp vegetables. Contains 2.5 grams of fat.

items.name: Pizza Sub with Cheese
items.description: The Italian sandwich par excellence. Topped with marinara sauce, pepperoni and cheese. Try it toasted for even more pizza taste!

items.name: Meatball Marinara
items.description: Zesty, juicy Italian-style meatballs covered with marinara sauce. Every bite is simply sensational! Get it toasted for even more great taste!

items.name: Italian B.M.T.
items.description: Thin slices of Genoa salami, pepperoni and ham, together with processed cheddar cheese. Mmmmmm, it’ll just melt in your mouth.

items.name: Roast Beef
items.description: Stuffed with thinly cut slices of roast beef, this crowd favourite is served on the oven-fresh bread of your choice. Contains 4.5 grams of fat.

items.name: Tuna
items.description: Bite into it, and experience flavour that's as fresh as an ocean breeze. Submerge yourself in its waves of unique taste!

items.name: Turkey Breast
items.description: Succulent sliced turkey breast with 4 grams of fat. No need to hold back. You can gobble it up guilt free!

items.name: Sweet Onion Chicken Teriyaki
items.description: A delicate flavour of teriyaki-glazed chicken strips and the tangy taste of fresh veggies and succulent sweet onion! Contains 4.5 grams of fat.

items.name: Steak & Cheese
items.description: Slices of hot, tender, juicy steak, served on the bread of your choice. Just bursting with flavour. Toast your bread to add even more great taste!

items.name: Subway Club
items.description: The perfect combination of thinly sliced turkey breast, tender roast beef and succulent ham! Satisfies every taste. Contains 4.5 grams of fat.

items.name: Subway Melt
items.description: Freshly baked bread stuffed with tender sliced turkey, ham, crispy bacon, melted cheese, and your choice of tasty vegetables and condiments.

items.name: Oven Roasted Chicken
items.description: Tender chicken cutlette on freshly baked bread... now that’s tempting to the max! Contains 4.5 grams of fat.

items.name: Chicken Pizziola with Cheese
items.description: Our fresh take on Italian. Juicy chicken, zest-errific pepperoni, and our signature recipe marinara sauce toasted with melty cheese on your favorite freshly baked bread.

items.name: Chicken Pizziola with Cheese Combo
items.description: Our fresh take on Italian. Juicy chicken, zest-errific pepperoni, and our signature recipe marinara sauce toasted with melty cheese on your favorite freshly baked bread.

items.name: Chipotle Steak & Cheese
items.description: 100% Canadian seasoned steak, crisp ciabatta bread and flavourful veggies with the spicy kick of chipotle sauce.  All grilled ‘till it’s so warm and cheesy it’ll melt your heart!

items.name: Chicken Bacon Ranch
items.description: Filled with seasoned rotisserie-style chicken, bacon, Monterey Cheddar cheese rolled in a tortilla and grilled to perfection, the new Chicken & Bacon Ranch is the perfect combination of crispy and melty.

items.name: Chicken Cordon Bleu
items.description: Perfected from the crispy ciabatta bread up, with seasoned chicken, black forest ham and fresh veggies, layered in Swiss Cheese and honey mustard, and pressed to melted magnificence.

items.name: Triple Cheese
items.description: Subway’s Triple Cheese Panini. Triple layers of indulgent cheesiness piled on crisp ciabatta, with fresh spinach, tomatoes and onions.  All grilled to a melty golden brown that’ll satisfy your comfort cravings.

items.name: B.L.T.
items.description: Introducing our new grilled wraps! Bacon, lettuce and tomatoes are topped with mayonnaise, wrapped in a flour tortilla, and grilled to tasty B.L.T. perfection.

items.name: Veggie Delite
items.description: Everything but the bread! Turn any one of your favourite sandwiches into a salad. Add crunch to your meal with chopped lettuce, red onions, tomatoes, cucumbers and much more

items.name: Classic / Classic Plus
items.description: Everything but the bread! Turn any one of your favorite sandwiches into a salad. Add crunch to your meal with chopped lettuce, red onions, tomatoes, cucumbers and much more!

items.name: Select / Select Plus Salad
items.description: Everything but the bread! Turn any one of your favorite sandwiches into a salad. Add crunch to your meal with chopped lettuce, red onions, tomatoes, cucumbers and much more!

items.name: Signature Salad
items.description: Everything but the bread! Turn any one of your favorite sandwiches into a salad. Add crunch to your meal with chopped lettuce, red onions, tomatoes, cucumbers and much more!

items.name: Premium Salad
items.description: Everything but the bread! Turn any one of your favorite sandwiches into a salad. Add crunch to your meal with chopped lettuce, red onions, tomatoes, cucumbers and much more!

items.name: Egg & Cheese
items.description: A classic for a reason. Our Egg and Cheese is simply delicious. Enjoy a fluffy egg omelet with melted cheese fresh toasted on freshly baked bread. It"s unbeatable. Try it with egg white on flatbread.

items.name: Bacon, Egg & Cheese
items.description: Start your day in a sizzlin' way with crispy bacon, egg and melty cheese on fresh toasted flatbread or whatever you like. It's hard to imagine this trio of tasty ingredients could get even better, but just wait till you try it with everything from juicy tomatoes to spicy jalapeños for a full on flavor free-for-all.

items.name: Ham, Egg & Cheese
items.description: Helllooo delicious! Enjoy savory ham, melted cheese, and egg whites all on a on 3” flatbread. Add your choice of toasty veggies for a tasty way to start the day!

items.name: Sausage, Egg & Cheese
items.description: Start your day in a sizzlin' way with sausage, egg and melty cheese on fresh toasted flatbread or whatever you like. It's hard to imagine this trio of tasty ingredients could get even better, but just wait till you try it with everything from juicy tomatoes to spicy jalapeños for a full on flavor free-for-all.

items.name: Chips
items.description: As delicious as our sandwiches are, they are even better when paired with the perfect side. Our variety of chips will satisfy everyone’s tastes. For a delicious cheesy flavour, try the new Miss Vickie’s Parmesan & Roasted Garlic chips on your next visit.

items.name: Soup
items.description: As delicious as our sandwiches are, they are even better when paired with the perfect side. Our variety of soups will satisfy everyone’s tastes.

items.name: Apple Slices
items.description: As delicious as our sandwiches are, they are even better when paired with the perfect side and drink. Our sides run from salty to sweet and from better-for-you to indulgent. With such a variety there"s truly something for every taste.

items.name: Cookie
items.description: As delicious as our sandwiches are, our cookies are always a great addition to a delicious meal. Tender and moist, it is the perfect way to complement your meal.

items.name: Fountain Drink
items.description: 21 oz.
